generated_text:
**Module 16: NLP (53 minutes, Advanced)**
Test your knowledge of Natural Language Processing (NLP) in AIIP. This quiz covers:
* Text preprocessing and tokenization
* Sentiment analysis and named entity recognition
* Machine learning models for NLP
* Real-world applications of NLP in AIIP
Answer 10 multiple-choice questions to assess your understanding of NLP concepts and techniques. Upon completion, evaluate your results and review key takeaways to reinforce your learning.
